typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as short,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as timestamp,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as short,
		COMMISSION_PCT as double,
		MANAGER_ID as short,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmployeeSrc
source(output(
		DEPARTMENT_ID as short,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME as string,
		MANAGER_ID as short,
		LOCATION_ID as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DepartmentSRC
source(output(
		COUNTRY_ID as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME as string,
		REGION_ID as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CountrySRC
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LocationSRC
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as short,
		START_DATE as timestamp,
		END_DATE as timestamp,
		JOB_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpHistorySRC
source(output(
		REGION_ID as short,
		REGION_NAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RegionsSRC
source(output(
		JOB_ID as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		MIN_SALARY as string,
		MAX_SALARY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> JobsSRC
EmployeeSrc select(mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		FIRST_NAME,
		LAST_NAME,
		EMAIL,
		PHONE_NUMBER,
		HIRE_DATE,
		JOB_ID,
		SALARY,
		COMMISSION_PCT,
		MANAGER_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EmpDataRemoveDuplicates
DepartmentSRC select(mapColumn(
		DEPARTMENT_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_NAME,
		MANAGER_ID,
		LOCATION_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DEPTRemoveDuplicates
CountrySRC select(mapColumn(
		COUNTRY_ID,
		COUNTRY_NAME,
		REGION_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CountryRemoveDuplicates
LocationSRC select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LOCRemoveDuplicates
EmpHistorySRC select(mapColumn(
		EMPLOYEE_ID,
		START_DATE,
		END_DATE,
		JOB_ID,
		DEPARTMENT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EMPHiRemoveDuplicates
RegionsSRC select(mapColumn(
		REGION_ID,
		REGION_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EmpRemoveDuplicates
JobsSRC select(mapColumn(
		JOB_ID,
		JOB_TITLE,
		MIN_SALARY,
		MAX_SALARY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> JobsRemoveDuplicates
